<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Poisoner Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6382) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 210 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand—you never know when some [arsenic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3322) or the like might prove useful. You gain the [advanced alchemy benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1435). You can use advanced alchemy to create four [alchemical poison](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=9)  [consumables](/Traits.aspx?ID=564) each day. You remember alchemical poison formulas and don't need a formula book for them.

<title level="2">Poisoner Dedication leads to...</title>
[Acquired Tolerance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6386), [Advanced Poisoncraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=6384), [Chemical Contagion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6387), [Poison Coat](/Feats.aspx?ID=6385), [Poisoner's Twist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6383)
name: Poisoner Dedication
